widget.description: OoshyBooshy | Indian Craft Blog Hello folks!! I am Anjali, an architect by profession and a craftohlic by heart. ‘OoshyBooshy’ is a platform where I am unboxing my ideas, my thoughts and all those little things for which I am passionate about. It is a place where I enjoy working, enjoying every bit of it. A little more about me: I love exploring beautiful places, eating delicious food, and spending time with my loved ones. I live in Delhi “in my solitude”. What I mean to say is I love occupied with my own things and currently living life in a healthy solitude. I hope that you will join me on this journey and support me as I am unfolding some of my good and bad experiences here. I am thankful to each and every one of you who spend the time to read my blog. THANKYOU
